about.me: We are two polyglot developers and educators building a community rooted in and starting with cardano but aiming to provide education and communication for the entire public blockchain space.
about.server: A kubernetes deployment hosted on google cloud. 32Gbps network. Auto scaling. Self healing.
about.company: Lido Nation Foundation is a non-profit registered in Wyoming, United States, operated out of Minnesota by man lido and lady lido.
